level.heading: Rulemaking.
level.text: The Mayor is authorized to promulgate rules necessary to implement this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-71, see notes following ยง 7-751.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority pursuant to DC Law 16-71, the District of Columbia Health Professional Recruitment Program Act of 2005, see Mayor's Order 2009- 176, October 13, 2009 (56 DCR 8480).
